// ** Reactstrap Imports import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardText, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' const NamingSource = () => { return ( Naming a source Add a <footer className="blockquote-footer"> for identifying the source. Wrap the name of the source work in <cite>.
Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful, that's what matters to me.
Steve Jobs Entrepreneur
) } export default NamingSource
